spindex.core.data_providers¶

Classes

BaseShapes Base class for indexed shapes.
GIShapes(data[, itree, ecls]) In-memory container of spatially indexed shapes.

Data containers for a spatially indexed collection of geometric shapes.

The module aim to be compatible with many type of data and to evaluate lazily as much as possible. For example, GIShapes data attribute can be any container implementing a subset of the Python mapping API. These can be dictionaries, pandas Series or pandas GeoSeries for example, but also an iterator on these types.

class spindex.core.data_providers.BaseShapes¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Base class for indexed shapes.

data¶
itree¶
true_nearest(geom, n_neighbours=1)¶

Returns the true n_neighbours-nearest neighbours to geom.

True nearest neighbours are sorted according to the actual distance between the geometries as given by their distance method.

Parameters:
  • geom (shapely geometry) – The target geometry to which we provide neighbours.
  • n_neighbours (int) – Then number of neighbours to return.
Returns:

List of the :param:`n_neighbours` nearest neighbours to :param:`geom`.
Return type:

list
